section.heading: International application of chapter.
section.text: The Superior Court may treat a foreign country as if it were a state for the purpose of applying this subchapter and Subchapters II, III, and V [of this chapter].

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 103 of the Uniform Adult Guardianship and Protective Proceedings Jurisdiction Act.
